authorizeOperator(address).details: Authorize an operator for the sender

params.operator: address to be authorized as operator

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address.

params.tokenHolder: The address to query the balance of.

balanceOf(address).return: uint256 representing the amount owned by the specified address.

burn(uint256,bytes).details: Burn the amount of tokens from the address msg.sender

params.amount: uint256 amount of tokens to transfer
params.data: bytes extra information provided by the token holder

defaultOperators().details: Get the list of default operators as defined by the token contract.

granularity().details: Gets the token's granularity, i.e. the smallest number of tokens (in the basic unit) which may be minted, sent or burned at any time

isOperatorFor(address,address).details: Indicate whether an address is an operator of the tokenHolder address

params.operator: address which may be an operator of tokenHolder
params.tokenHolder: address of a token holder which may have the operator address as an operator.

operatorBurn(address,uint256,bytes,bytes.details: Burn the amount of tokens on behalf of the address from

params.amount: uint256 amount of tokens to transfer
params.data: bytes extra information provided by the token holder
params.operatorData: bytes extra information provided by the operator (if any)

operatorSend(address,address,uint256,byt.details: Send the amount of tokens on behalf of the address from to the address to

params.amount: uint256 amount of tokens to transfer
params.data: bytes information attached to the send, and intended for the recipient (to)
params.operatorData: bytes extra information provided by the operator (if any)

revokeOperator(address).details: Revoke operator rights from one of the default operators

params.operator: address to revoke operator rights from

send(address,uint256,bytes).details: Send the amount of tokens from the address msg.sender to the address to

params.amount: uint256 amount of tokens to transfer
params.data: bytes information attached to the send, and intended for the recipient (to)

totalSupply().details: Total number of tokens in existence
